item.title: Fix Audio Sync Issue in Short Video - Upwork
item.description:
I have a short, 3 minute video that is suffering from some drift between the audio and the video. As a result, the audio starts off in sync with the video but after about 20 seconds starts to drift off. I would like someone to help me sync both audio and video so it looks and sounds seamless.

Budget: $20

item.title: Content Creator Assistant for LinkedIn and YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Content Creator Assistant for LinkedIn and YouTube

I am looking for a creative and organized individual to help with content creation for my LinkedIn and YouTube channels. The ideal candidate will have experience in content brainstorming, trend analysis, and video transcripts.

Responsibilities
- Brainstorming and generating content ideas relevant to business technology, productivity, and KPI improvement.
- Staying updated with industry trends to ensure content is current and engaging.
- Creating video transcripts for YouTube videos.
- Assisting with content planning and scheduling.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in content creation and trend analysis.
- Strong understanding of LinkedIn and YouTube platforms.
- Excellent English communication skills.
- Familiarity with content planning tools and video editing software.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Skills Required:
1. Help with Content Creation
2. Trend Analysis
3. Video Transcription
4. Some SEO Knowledge
5. Content Planning
6. Social Media Management
7. Research Skills
8. Copywriting
9. Basic Video Editing
10. Project Management

Please provide examples of your previous work and a brief explanation of how you can contribute to my content strategy.
The content will be about online business, entrepreneurship and personal development topics.

Looking forward to your applications!
Dmitrii

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:07 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, LinkedIn, Audience Research, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Telemarketing Scriptwriting, Trend Analysis, SEO Content, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: YouTube, LinkedIn, Audience Research, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Telemarketing Scriptwriting, Trend Analysis, SEO Content, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: Moldova

item.title: 📷 Need work? Cash Cow Videos? Total Cost Per Video? - Upwork
item.description:
To Apply: Quote me how much you will charge me PER VIDEO, for everything.  

You can leverage as many AI tools as you need to like: Pictory, Eleven Labs, Gamma AI, whatever you need to use.

Looking for someone that can make videos for my youtube channel here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOB-5jnfDH24_pHVawul57g

looking for someone that will give me a total cost PER video.

That means everything, scriptwriting, thumbnail etc...
and a humanized voice over using eleven labs or a similar tool that passes the youtube monetization standards.

Please tell me how much you will charge me for each 10 minute video. TOTAL.  Total price.

I will not consider anything else except for a clear total price.

I'm really looking for someone that's hungry to get experience and knows they can do that, and will be happy with getting paid PER VIDEO and doing it all.

I'm not trying to waste anyone's time, so please do not reply if you do not give me a total per video based on the youtube channel I am showing you.

Thank you very much.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Subtitles, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Direct Response Ad Creatives Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled direct response based video editor to create engaging ad creatives for our clients doing upwards of $1 million/ month.

The ideal candidate should have experience in editing video content specifically for ads that go live on Facebook or Google.

The primary responsibility will be to transform raw footage and scripts into ad creatives/ videos that align with the brand's messaging and objectives and would be ready to publish inside the ad account.

Start the application with 'video' if you read this

We will shortlist candidates and ask them to carry out a short trial, which if done well, will mean we can work together long-term.

Apply with any direct response-related ad creatives you edited (ideally published on an ad account like Facebook or Google).

The editor should have a strong understanding of video storytelling, pacing, and visual effects to create captivating videos that drive engagement and conversions.

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 27, 2024 20:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Graphic Design - Upwork
item.description:
Our company is looking to hire a Virtual Graphic Designer to work for our company and assist our CMO & Sales Manager. We are looking to have someone join our team to help with the following projects.

1. Create Sales Material
2. Create Marketing Material
3. Help Assist with putting together analytics reports
5. Create company assets
4. Create Website Assets
6. Help write, design and schedule email newsletters monthly
7. Assist with Basic Video Editing Projects
8. Help do cold out reach to potential clients.
9. Support our team with our marketing needs.

This position will start out at 15-20 hours a week, but can quickly move into a full time position for the right person.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$13.00

item.title: Editor Youtube shorts - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We are looking for a short creator for our YouTube channel. Here are the details of what we need:

- We want someone who can take content from TikTok and remove the URL so that YouTube doesn't know where the content is from.
- The TikTok content should have at least 100,000 likes.
- The content should be viral.
- The script must be written by you.
- We need an AI voiceover.
- We want engaging sentences throughout, for example: "Want to see how this ends? Don't forget to subscribe."
- We would like to hire you for $10 per hour (2 workdays per week, 3 hours each day), and we expect at least 5 shorts per hour.

If you are interested in our offer, we look forward to hearing from you.

We would like one short as an example in this niche.

Best regards,

Arianne and Daan

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Video editor for Space and Cosmos Realted YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor who can do the following:
- Find relevant footage or pictures for the video
- Add effects such as transitions, lower thirds and overlays at the start of videos
- Make an engaging video

To provide a clear idea of the type of content we aim to produce, please take a moment to view the following examples:

https://www.youtube.com/@SpacedustDOC/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@KosmoDOC/videos
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=13expQNZN7E
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-Gdv0BO-oI

We kindly request that you watch a few videos on the sample channels to grasp the specific style of video editing we're seeking.

The videos will be around 1.5 hours (90 minutes) long.

Payment: $90 per video
We are looking for someone who is communicative, responsive, and understands what makes a video enjoyable to watch.

In your proposal include:
- your portfolio/previous work
- how many videos you think you'd be able to make
- any other relevant previous work

Budget: $90

item.title: Sports Highlights Video Editor and Motion Graphics Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create a 10-minute compilation video of sports highlights. The ideal candidate should also have experience in implementing motion graphics to enhance the overall visual appeal of the film. This project requires creativity, attention to detail, and the ability to bring excitement to the footage through dynamic editing techniques. The selected candidate will be responsible for selecting the best moments from various sports events and incorporating them into a cohesive and engaging video to match a script.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Motion graphics design
- Creative storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines

If you are passionate about sports and have a strong eye for captivating visuals, please apply with your portfolio showcasing relevant work in order SKIP THE LINE!

We are a fast-growing sports outfit, and if we are satisfied with the quality of work, there will be opportunities for long-term collaboration. through the rest of the year on a project a week basis.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:41 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Social Media Editor + Videographer for Dynamic Marketing Agency - Upwork
item.description:
Location: Franklin, Tennessee
Industry: Marketing and Business Development
Focus Areas: Sports and Music Industries

About Us:

We're a fast-paced, forward-thinking marketing agency located in the heart of Franklin, Tennessee. For the past 8 years, we've been at the cutting edge of digital marketing and business development, crafting and executing strategies that propel our clients to the forefront of their industries. Our client roster is diverse, with a special focus on the vibrant worlds of sports and music.

As we continue to grow, we're looking for an Account + Project Manager who is not only passionate about digital marketing but also thrives in the dynamic intersection of creativity and strategy. If you're someone who speaks the language of online marketing giants like Brendon Burchard, Jeff Walker, Russell Brunson, and Dan Kennedy, you're the kind of person we're looking to welcome into our team.

The Role:

As our Social Media Editor and Videographer, you'll be the creative powerhouse behind our agency's visual content across various platforms. This role demands a blend of innovative video editing skills, a deep understanding of social media dynamics, and a flair for capturing compelling footage. You'll be expected to:

•Edit and produce both long-form and short-form content tailored for different social media platforms, ensuring each piece resonates with the target audience.
Stay ahead of social media trends and algorithms, applying this knowledge to create impactful content that drives engagement.

•Capture high-quality footage, utilizing your expertise in camera angles, lighting, and overall cinematography.

•Work in a fast-paced environment, adapting quickly to feedback and making swift changes to meet tight deadlines.

•Take risks and think outside the box, bringing a unique and unhinged creative approach to all projects.
Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and generate fresh, innovative content ideas.

•Maintain proficiency in video editing software such as Premiere Pro, CapCut, and other industry-standard tools.

•Be available for in-person collaboration at our Franklin, Tennessee office 1-2 times a week.

Requirements:

•Proven experience in video editing and content creation for social media platforms.

•Strong understanding of the nuances and requirements of different social media channels.

•Proficiency in video editing software, including Premiere Pro, CapCut, and similar tools.

•Ability to capture and produce high-quality footage, with a solid grasp of camera techniques, lighting, and composition.

•Highly creative, idea-driven, and capable of taking full creative freedom.

•Excellent ability to handle critiques and implement feedback quickly and efficiently.

•Local to Nashville, Tennessee, with the ability to work in-person at our Franklin office 1-2 times a week.

•A collaborative mindset, ready to contribute to team brainstorming sessions and execute shared creative visions.

Why Join Us?

Joining our team means stepping into a dynamic role where your creativity and skills directly impact our agency's success. You'll work within a collaborative, energetic environment that values innovation and outside-the-box thinking. This is a unique opportunity to influence the visual storytelling of brands across various industries, making significant contributions to their growth and engagement.

If you're ready to embrace a fast-paced, creative role and bring your unique vision to life, we want to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Sales Letter Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to join our team, specializing in editing Video Sales Letters (VSLs). Your main tasks will include matching clips to audio, finding corresponding video clips, organizing Premiere Pro timelines, and adding creative visuals using Adobe After Effects. Each video will be 5-6 minutes long, and you’ll be responsible for editing 5 to 7 videos per week.

Requirements:

• Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects
• Strong ability to match clips to audio
• Creative flair for enhancing videos
• Good communication skills
• Organized and detail-oriented

How We Work:

• Clear expectations for tasks and deliverables
• Emphasis on teamwork and good communication
• Collaborative and creative work environment

Hourly Range: $15.00-$38.00

item.title: Create a 30-second "Teaching Video" - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone who can provide a 30-second teaching clip. This clip will be used in our marketing efforts in a larger video. You will not be required to actually teach anything. You are simply "acting".
We will provide a script that you can read through, even though your voice will not be used. You should be prepared to be standing in the video. The ideal candidate will be able to create a split screen or side-by-side type of video of themselves on one side and the text/course information that will be provided for this video on the other side. We only need a 30-second clip.
We are looking for a North American Accent. Race, Sex, and age does not matter. We are looking to complete this job as soon as possible, ideally in less than 3 days.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video Creator / Editor Needed for 1-3 min YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who can record and do a voiceover and quick simple edits for quick 30sec - 3min how to videos on youtube.  You must speak fluent English and use your own voice.

I need some tutorials made for the video game wuthering waves right now.  

The pay rate is $2 per video

You do not need to show your face on camera.  You only need to do screen recordings with your voice.

Right now I just need about 12 video tutorials for the video game withering waves.  If I like your work I can possibly hire you for more work as I am looking to hire someone to do about 20 videos per week ongoing.

Example videos for the types of videos and quality I need:
https://youtu.be/4i_spX1Ap6M
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oVcgG_Fp-zo

Send me some sample work.

To prove you have read the ad write in the beginning of your response:
wuthering waves
$2 per video
NO AI voiceovers.  Need someone who can speak fluent English and use their own voice

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 27, 2024 19:17 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
